i1.name: Daredevil Impulse
description: {{sbc|Innate - Style:}} Damaging [[basic attack]]s and [[champion ability|abilities]] against at least one enemy {{tip|champion}} different from the previous damaging hit made against champions grants '''Samira''' a ''Style'' stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. The duration {{tt|refreshes|Does not have to be unique from previous hit to refresh duration}} on subsequent damaging attacks and abilities against enemy champions. The stack count is represented by the grades [[File:Samira Rank E.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank D.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank C.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank B.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank A.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank S.png|20px|border|link=]] to the left of her [[health bar]] for '''Samira''' herself, and a stack counter underneath the bar that is visible to all players.
'''Samira''' gains {{as|{{pp|3.5*(x-1) for 7|No grade;E;D;C;B;A;S|key=%|label1= [[File:Daredevil Impulse.png|20px|border|link=]] Style grade}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}|ms}}.

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Samira's''' basic attacks against targets in {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 200 range use her blade, becoming {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}}. Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} with the blade and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}}, {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}}, and the slash and explosives of {{ai|Flair|Samira}} deal {{as|{{pp|2 to 19}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|0 to 100 by 10|0 to 100 by 10|key=%|key1=%|label1=target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}.

Additionally, '''Samira's''' basic attacks against {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} enemies deal the {{as|attack's damage}} over 6 attacks in {{fd|0.5}} seconds and {{tip|airborne|knock up}} the target for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. This causes her basic attack timer to {{tip|basic attack reset|reset}} and the attack to become {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}. If the target is not within {{sti|attack range}}, '''Samira''' will quickly {{tip|dash}} into it from a certain distance and then attack. This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
The empowered attack can {{tip|critically strike}}. {{tip|On-hit}} effects are only applied once.
i1.notes:
* The empowered attack can trigger on {{tip|immobilize|immobilizes}} for both ally and enemy sources.
** Self-applied or allied-applied {{tip|immobilize|immobilizes}} from the enemy '''will''' count for the empowered attack to trigger.{{bug|2}}
** Those applied by the ''neutral'' team (e.g. {{uis|Dragon}} initial knock back) '''can''' be targeted.
** It cannot trigger against enemies knocked {{tip|airborne}} by a {{ui|Blast Cone}} triggered by anyone.{{bug|2}}
* The empowered attack's interaction with [[Crowd control#Immunity|immunities to crowd control]]:
** It ''will not'' trigger against {{tip|displacement immune}} targets. If the empowered attack had already gone off, the knock up will ''not'' be resisted, thus interrupting the target's actions.{{bug|2}}
** It ''will'' trigger against {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} targets.
*** The knock up will however be partially resisted against {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}}; only the disabling portion (airborne debuff) will be negated but not the displacement (forced movement).{{bug|2}}
*** The knock up will be resisted by {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}, but the ability does not trigger its on-{{tip|immobilize|immobilization}} effect.{{bug|2}}
* The application of the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} can occur on any of the missiles of the empowered attack if it had not already occurred on the first missile.
** A missile that is parried by {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}} or is {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, {{tip|block|blocked}}, or missed while '''Samira''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} '''cannot''' apply the knock up.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Samira''' cannot {{tip|dash}} into range to use the empowered attack. She can only use it if her target is within her {{sti|attack range}} while under this condition.
* The on-target cooldown will apply even if the empowered attack is parried.
* The empowered attack rolls {{tip|critical strike}} for each shot of the flurry.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} dealt with the blade is {{tip|default damage}}. The empowered attack is first 1 instance of {{tip|basic damage}} and then 5 instances of {{tip|default damage}}.
** The bonus damage does not apply to [[structures]].
* The empowered attack triggers {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}} once.
* The empowered attack is unaffected by {{stil|attack speed}} modifiers.
* {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} ''Phantom Hit'' and {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} bolts will not apply the {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, since it is {{tip|on-hit}} of specifically the melee attack casts.
* Attacks with the gun and blade do not count as different attacks for stacking ''Style''.
* Basic attacks using the blade are still classified as {{tip|ranged}}.
* The melee attack's range condition is unaffected by {{stil|attack range}} modifiers (e.g. {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}).
** Blade range is calculated edge-to-edge just like basic attack ranges are, hence both '''Samira''' gaining bonus [[size]] or her target increases the total distance at which '''Samira''' can attack them with the blade.
* Since the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} requires an exterior source to {{tip|immobilize}} the enemy, {{ri|Aftershock}} will be swapped with {{ri|Grasp of the Undying}} for '''Samira''' at the start of the game.
* Abilities blocked by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} will still grant '''Samira''' ''Style'' stacks.

q1.name: Flair
q1.target_range: {{tt|950|Gun cast indicator - true range pending for test}} / {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|X|Cone radius & Blade targeting length}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' fires a shot in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy it hits.
If a targetable enemy is in front of '''Samira''' at the time of starting the cast, she will slash with her blade instead, dealing the same damage to all enemies hit in a cone.

Casting ''Flair'' during {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} will cause '''Samira''' to deploy explosives along her path which detonate upon the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies within the covered distance. This can be done while performing {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} or {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} despite ''Flair'' being disabled during them.{{bug|2}}
''Flair'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|25|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}} and both the shot and slash apply {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
q1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} on the shot and {{tip|area damage}} on the slash and explosives.
** {{stil|Life steal}} will always benefit from the damage dealt at 100% effectiveness and does not take into account of the ability's [[spell effects]], whereas on the other hand for effects such as {{ii|Death's Dance}} and {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} do, and they will modify the {{tip|healing}} accordingly.
* The slash and explosives roll their {{tip|critical strike}} against each target individually.
* The shot and the slash do not count as different abilities for stacking {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style}}.
* The explosives do not benefit from {{stil|life steal}}.
* '''Samira's''' next attack after using ''Flair'' will occasionally come out faster.{{bug|2}}
* '''Samira''' can use {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} during ''Flair's'' cast time.
* ''Flair'' will fire or slash from wherever '''Samira''' is at the end of the cast time.
** '''Samira''' will always slash in her facing direction, and she will turn to face the target direction only once at the start of the cast time.
* ''Flair'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* ''Flair'' deals {{as|{{ap|0*1.25 to 20*1.25}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 125% AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} when it {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}}, increased to {{as|{{ap|0*1.5 to 20*1.5}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|150}}% AD)}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}.
* Only the shot will be destroyed by {{tip|projectile|projectile-intercepting}} effects.
* The explosive placement is illustrated in {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} regardless of whether ''Flair'' is available.
** The VFX always covers the the full dash's distance even if {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} is interrupted mid-dash.

w1.name: Blade Whirl
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' slashes around herself twice over {{fd|1.25}} seconds, the first slash occurring immediately and the second being performed {{fd|0.25}} seconds before the duration ends, each one dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies.
'''Samira''' destroys all hostile non-{{tip|turret}} {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} that enter or are in her vicinity during this time.
'''''Samira''' cannot attack nor cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} during Blade Whirl. Casting {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} will end Blade Whirl early without performing the second slash.''
leveling: {{st|Slash Damage|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 80*2}} {{as|(+ 160% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
w1.notes:
* ''Blade Whirl's'' area of effect is fixed around '''Samira'''.
* ''Blade Whirl'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* Both slashes count as the same ability for stacking {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage from one slash.
* Entering {{tip|stasis}} (e.g. using {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}) will also end Blade Whirl early without performing the second slash.
** Other item actives and channeling {{si|Teleport}} or {{si|Recall}} will ''not'' end the effect early.
* '''Samira''' can ignore the lockout for {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and basic attacks if she uses {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} and queues up {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and/or a basic attack at the start of it.{{bug}}
* {{uis|Baron Nashor}} attacks are not destroyed.{{bug}}

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Slash Damage|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 80*2}} {{as|(+ 160% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Slash Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 160% bonus AD)

e1.name: Wild Rush
e1.target_range: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|600|Cast range}} / {{tt|650|Dash distance}} / {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|650|Dash hitbox length}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the direction of the target allied or enemy unit and slashes all enemies in her path, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
'''''Samira''' can cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} or {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} during Wild Rush. Using {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} will buffer it to cast at the end of the dash.''
e1.notes:
* ''Wild Rush'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} will be buffered to cast at the end of the dash if {{ai|Flair|Samira}} was cast during the dash.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Wild Rush'' will interrupt the dash but deal damage to nearby enemies at the location.
** If {{ai|Flair|Samira}} was cast during this time, an explosive will also be placed at that location.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 20% bonus AD)

  • Attack Speed: %

r1.name: Inferno Trigger
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons for {{rutngt|2.25}}, '''reducing''' her {{as|movement speed}}{{ft|by 30%|by 9% (including {{ais|Daredevil Impulse|Samira}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}})}}and rapidly shooting at all nearby enemies over {{rutngt|2}} at sporadic times in {{tt|{{fd|0.2}}-second intervals|on average; total of 5 intervals of 0.231 and 5 of 0.198 seconds}} each, dealing {{as|physical damage}} with each shot, reduced by 75% against {{tip|minions}}.
Each shot can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}} and applies {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.

''Inferno Trigger cannot be cast unless at maximum [[File:Samira Rank S.png|20px|border|link=]] {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style}} stacks (6), and all stacks will be consumed at the end of the effect. A nearby visible enemy is also required to cast this ability, but beyond that '''Samira''' does not need to have {{tip|sight}} of a target to fire at them.''

'''''Samira''' cannot attack nor cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} during Inferno Trigger, but she can still move. Inferno Trigger will end prematurely by all forms of {{tip|interrupt|interrupting}} {{tip|crowd control}} as well as {{tip|disarm}}.''
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Shot|{{ap|0 to 20}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}}|Total Damage Per Target|{{ap|0*10 to 20*10}} {{as|(+ 500% AD)}}|Minion Damage Per Shot|{{ap|0*0.25 to 20*0.25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.25}}% AD)}}|Total Damage Per Minion|{{ap|0*0.25*10 to 20*0.25*10}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.25*10}}% AD)}}}}
r1.notes:
* '''Samira's''' facing direction remains as it had been or, if she is moving, towards that direction during ''Inferno Trigger''.
* The {{stil|movement speed}} reduction stacks additively with other {{as|movement speed}} bonuses. 
** It is a negative bonus, not a {{tip|slow}}, and is thus not reduced by {{tip|slow resist}}.
* ''Inferno Trigger's'' area of effect is fixed around '''Samira'''.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage of one shot.
* ''Inferno Trigger'' will not end if there are no enemies that remain in range.
* ''Inferno Trigger'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it becomes unsealed or off cooldown.
* The shots roll {{tip|critical strike}} against each target individually.
* A shot that {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}} will deal  {{as|{{ap|0*2 to 20*2}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} to non-minions, increased to {{as|{{ap|0*2.25 to 20*2.25}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|112.5}}% AD)}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}.
** With 100% {{stil|critical strike chance}}, ''Inferno Trigger'' will deal {{as|{{ap|0*10*2 to 20*10*2}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 1000% AD)}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} per non-minion, increased to {{as|{{ap|0*10*2.25 to 20*10*2.25}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 1125% AD)}} with {{ii|Infinity Edge}}.
* The bottom of the [[Summoner|player's]] screen will have a fiery visual effect while '''Samira''' is at ''S'' rank and ''Inferno Trigger'' has at least one rank.
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '3,3,3' as '3'

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Physical Damage Per Shot|{{ap|0 to 20}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}}|Total Damage Per Target|{{ap|0*10 to 20*10}} {{as|(+ 500% AD)}}|Minion Damage Per Shot|{{ap|0*0.25 to 20*0.25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.25}}% AD)}}|Total Damage Per Minion|{{ap|0*0.25*10 to 20*0.25*10}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.25*10}}% AD)}}}}
